dmca.title: [TP-C161928D] Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please re-send the below-pasted complaint to copyright@theplanet.com, since ThePlanet did not receive the attached Cease and Desist notice regarding http://www.scifiboxsets.com . Thank you, Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Friday, July 14, 2006 12:32 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [TP-C161928D] Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures Subject: [TP-C161928D] Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [TP-C161928D] Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures Reference: [TP-C161928D] No attachement For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures Added by system at Friday, Jul 14 2006 05:31 pm X-MailFrom: Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.180] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Fri Jul 14 17:30:57 2006 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 14 Jul 2006 17:30:56 -0500 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org) with esmtp (Exim) id 1G1WBU-000OLB-PK for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Fri, 14 Jul 2006 17:30:56 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 14 Jul 2006 17:30:56 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1G1WBU-0002oR-0b for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 14 Jul 2006 17:30:56 -0500 Received: from keys.mpaa.org ([66.252.128.54]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org) with esmtp (Exim) id 1G1WBT-000Jr2-7S for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 14 Jul 2006 17:30:55 -0500 Received: from keys.mpaa.org (localhost.localdomain [127.0.0.1]) by keys.mpaa.org (PGP Universal) with ESMTP id 955AE2F373C for ; Fri, 14 Jul 2006 15:30:54 -0700 (PDT) Received: from mailgate.mpaa.org ([192.168.90.25]) by keys.mpaa.org (PGP Universal service); Fri, 14 Jul 2006 15:30:54 -0700 X-PGP-Universal: processed; by keys.mpaa.org on Fri, 14 Jul 2006 15:30:54 -0700 Received: from LAMAIL2.mpaa.org ([192.168.100.241]) by mailgate.mpaa.org with Microsoft SMTPSVC(5.0.2195.7035); Fri, 14 Jul 2006 15:30:54 -0700 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C6A795.2AD9427F" Subject: Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures Date: Fri, 14 Jul 2006 15:30:53 -0700 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: yes X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures thread-index: AcanlS2I2Hge7L5SS+qPYkN+RHmpgA== From: To: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 14 Jul 2006 22:30:54.0093 (UTC) FILETIME=[2B0DD3D0:01C6A795] Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 66.252.128.54 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of mpaa.org) client-ip=66.252.128.54; envelope-from=Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org; helo=keys.mpaa.org; Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 70.87.6.111 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of mpaa.org) client-ip=70.87.6.111; envelope-from=Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org; helo=smtp02.theplanet.com; (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear General Counsel, Attached is a Cease and Desist notice regarding http://www.scifiboxsets.com (69.93.90.72), which is hosted by the Planet. The offending website is offering hard good copies of our members' copyrighted motion pictures. We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter. Please feel free to contact me if needed. Richard Rosner US Anti-Piracy Motion Picture Association Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org 818-995-6600 x 325 MIME element (text/html)

Dear General Counsel,

 

Attached is a Cease and Desist notice regarding http://www.scifiboxsets.com (69.93.90.72), which is hosted by the Planet. 

 

The offending website is offering hard good copies of our members’ copyrighted motion pictures.

 

We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.

 

Please feel free to contact me if needed.

 

Richard Rosner

US Anti-Piracy

Motion Picture Association

Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org

818-995-6600 x 325

 

 

MIME element (text/plain) MIME element (text/plain) MOTION PICTURE ASSOCIATION OF AMERICA, INC. 15503 VENTURA BOULEVARD ENCINO, CALIFORNIA 91436 UNITED STATES Anti-Piracy Operations PHONE: (818) 728 - 8127 Email: antipiracy@copyright.org June 21, 2006 Name: General Counsel ISP: ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. (theplanet.com) Via Fax/Email RE: Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures Reference#: The Planet-10000 (M) IP Address: 69.93.90.72 http://www.scifiboxsets.com Date of Infringement: July 14, 2006 Dear General Counsel: The Motion Picture Association of America (MPAA) represents the following motion picture production and distribution companies: Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. Disney Enterprises, Inc. Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc. Paramount Pictures Corporation TriStar Pictures, Inc. Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation United Artists Pictures, Inc. United Artists Corporation Universal City Studios, LLLP Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. We have received information that, on the above noted date, the IP address 69.93.90.72 (http://www.scifiboxsets.com) was used to sell or to materially contribute to the selling of DVD copies of copyrighted motion pictures. The title(s) offered included, but were not limited to: 24 (http://www.scifiboxsets.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=25&products_ id=94) The A-Team (http://www.scifiboxsets.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=25&products_ id=311) Airwolf (http://www.scifiboxsets.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=25&products_ id=317) Alias (http://www.scifiboxsets.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=25&products_ id=191) Babylon 5 (http://www.scifiboxsets.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=25&products_ id=193) Dark Angel (http://www.scifiboxsets.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=25&products_ id=131) Family Guy (http://www.scifiboxsets.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=25&products_ id=194) Lost (http://www.scifiboxsets.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=25&products_ id=302) Roswell (http://www.scifiboxsets.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=25&products_ id=208) Star Trek Enterprise (http://www.scifiboxsets.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=25&products_ id=236) The X-Files (http://www.scifiboxsets.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=25&products_ id=206) We believe this information should prove sufficient for you to locate the material complained about herein; however, please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or clarification requests you may have. The unauthorized distribution or public performance of copyrighted motion pictures constitutes copyright infringement under the Copyright Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 106(3)-(4). This conduct may also violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty obligations. As the owner of this IP address, we request that you immediately do the following: 1. Notify the end user of the infringement(s). 2. Remove or disable access to the material identified above. 3. Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms of Service Agreement. On behalf of the respective owners of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, we hereby state, pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 512, that the information in this notification is accurate and that we have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law. Also pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, we hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owners of the exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this notification. Please contact us at the above listed address or by replying to this email should you have any questions. Kindly include the above noted Reference # in the subject line of all email correspondence. We thank you for your cooperation in this matter. Your prompt response is requested. Respectfully, Motion Picture Association of America MIME element (text/plain)
